attributes.action: We wish petition the 16 countries that ban outright citizens from Israel
attributes.background: There are 16 countries which ban outright people with Israeli passports or people who have stamps on their passports from Israel.  I want my government to petition to get this overturned.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to urge the governments of these countries to change their immigration policies.
